<p class="kb"><span class="jk">Notes</span></p>
<p class="kb"><span class="jk"> </span></p>
<p class="kc"><span><sup><span class="ci">i</span></sup></span><span><span class="ci"> Please note this form should be read jointly with the applicable Disclosure Guidance and Transparency Rules Chapter 5 (DTR5) available on the following link: </span></span><span class="ci"><a href="https://www.handbook.fca.org.uk/handbook/DTR/5/?view=chapter" data-type="url" class="tr-link" translate="no">https://www.handbook.fca.org.uk/handbook/DTR/5/?view=chapter</a></span></p>
<p class="kd"><span class="cg"> </span></p>
<p class="kc"><span><sup><span class="ci">ii</span></sup></span><span><span class="ci"> Full name of the legal entity and further specification of the issuer or underlying issuer, provided it is reliable and accurate (e.g. address, LEI, domestic number identity). Indicate in the relevant section whether the issuer is a non UK issuer.</span></span></p>
<p class="kd"><span class="ci"> </span></p>
<p class="kc"><span><sup><span class="ci">iii</span></sup></span><span><span class="ci"> Other reason for the notification could be voluntary notifications, changes of attribution of the nature of the holding (e.g. expiring of financial instruments) or acting in concert.</span></span></p>
<p class="kd"><span class="ci"> </span></p>
<p class="kc"><span><sup><span class="ci">iv</span></sup></span><span><span class="ci"> This should be the full name of (a) the shareholder; (b) the natural person or legal entity acquiring, disposing of or exercising voting rights in the cases provided for in DTR5.2.1 (b) to (h); (c) all parties to the agreement referred to in DTR5.2.1 (a) or (d) the holder of financial instruments referred to in DTR5.3.1.</span></span></p>
<p class="kd"><span class="ci"> </span></p>
<p class="kd"><span class="ci">As the disclosure of cases of acting in concert may vary due to the specific circumstances (e.g. same or different total positions of the parties, entering or exiting of acting in concert by a single party) the standard form does not provide for a specific method how to notify cases of acting in concert.</span></p>
<p class="kd"><span class="ci"> </span></p>
<p class="kd"><span class="ci">In relation to the transactions referred to in  DTR5.2.1 (b) to (h), the following list is provided as indication of the persons who should be mentioned:</span></p>
<p class="kd"><span class="ci"> </span></p>
<p class="ke"><span class="ci">- in the circumstances foreseen in DTR5.2.1 (b), the natural person or legal entity that acquires the voting rights and is entitled to exercise them under the agreement and the natural person or legal entity who is transferring temporarily for consideration the voting rights;</span></p>
<p class="ke"><span class="ci"> </span></p>
<p class="ke"><span class="ci">- in the circumstances foreseen in DTR5.2.1 (c), the natural person or legal entity holding the collateral, provided the person or entity controls the voting rights and declares its intention of exercising them, and natural person or legal entity lodging the collateral under these conditions;</span></p>
<p class="ke"><span class="ci"> </span></p>
<p class="ke"><span class="ci">- in the circumstances foreseen in DTR5.2.1 (d), the natural person or legal entity who has a life interest in shares if that person or entity is entitled to exercise the voting rights attached to the shares and the natural person or legal entity who is disposing of the voting rights when the life interest is created;</span></p>
<p class="ke"><span class="ci"> </span></p>
<p class="ke"><span class="ci">- in the circumstances foreseen in DTR5.2.1 (e), the controlling natural person or legal entity and, provided it has a notification duty at an individual level under DTR 5.1, under DTR5.2.1 (a) to (d) or under a combination of any of those situations, the controlled undertaking;</span></p>
<p class="ke"><span class="ci"> </span></p>
<p class="ke"><span class="ci">- in the circumstances foreseen in DTR5.2.1 (f), the deposit taker of the shares, if he can exercise the voting rights attached to the shares deposited with him at his discretion, and the depositor of the shares allowing the deposit taker to exercise the voting rights at his discretion;</span></p>
<p class="ke"><span class="ci"> </span></p>
<p class="ke"><span class="ci">- in the circumstances foreseen in DTR5.2.1 (g), the natural person or legal entity that controls the voting rights;</span></p>
<p class="ke"><span class="ci"> </span></p>
<p class="ke"><span class="ci">- in the circumstances foreseen in DTR5.2.1 (h), the proxy holder, if he can exercise the voting rights at his discretion, and the shareholder who has given his proxy to the proxy holder allowing the latter to exercise the voting rights at his discretion (e.g. management companies).</span></p>
<p class="kd"><span class="ci"> </span></p>
<p class="kc"><span><sup><span class="ci">v</span></sup></span><span><span class="ci"> Applicable in the cases provided for in DTR5.2.1 (b) to (h). This should be the full name of the shareholder who is the counterparty to the natural person or legal entity referred to DTR5.2 unless the percentage of voting rights held by the shareholder is lower than the lowest notifiable threshold for the disclosure of voting rights holdings in accordance with national practices (e.g. identification of funds managed by management companies).</span></span></p>
<p class="kd"><span class="ci"> </span></p>
<p class="kc"><span><sup><span class="ci">vi</span></sup></span><span><span class="ci"> The date on which threshold is crossed or reached should be the date on which the acquisition or disposal took place or the other reason triggered the notification obligation. For passive crossings, the date when the corporate event took effect.</span></span></p>
<p class="kd"><span class="ci"> </span></p>
<p class="kc"><span><sup><span class="ci">vii</span></sup></span><span><span class="ci"> The total number of voting rights held in the issuer shall be composed of all the shares, including depository receipts representing shares, to which voting rights are attached even if the exercise thereof is suspended.</span></span></p>
<p class="kd"><span class="ci"> </span></p>
<p class="kc"><span><sup><span class="ci">viii</span></sup></span><span><span class="ci"> If the holding has fallen below the lowest applicable threshold, please note that it might not be necessary to disclose the extent of the holding, only that the new holding is below that threshold.</span></span></p>
<p class="kd"><span class="ci"> </span></p>
<p class="kc"><span><sup><span class="ci">ix</span></sup></span><span><span class="ci"> In case of combined holdings of shares with voting rights attached "direct holding" and voting rights "indirect holding", please split the voting rights number and percentage into the direct and indirect columns - if there is no combined holdings, please leave the relevant box blank.</span></span></p>
<p class="kd"><span class="ci"> </span></p>
<p class="kc"><span><sup><span class="ci">x</span></sup></span><span><span class="ci"> Date of maturity/expiration of the financial instrument i.e. the date when right to acquire shares ends.</span></span></p>
<p class="kd"><span class="ci"> </span></p>
<p class="kc"><span><sup><span class="ci">xi</span></sup></span><span><span class="ci"> If the financial instrument has such a period - please specify this period - for example once every 3 months starting from [date]. </span></span></p>
<p class="kd"><span class="ci"> </span></p>
<p class="kc"><span><sup><span class="ci">xii</span></sup></span><span><span class="ci"> In case of cash settled instruments the number and percentages of voting rights is to be presented on a delta-adjusted basis (DTR 5.3.3.A).</span></span></p>
<p class="kd"><span class="ci"> </span></p>
<p class="kc"><span><sup><span class="ci">xiii</span></sup></span><span><span class="ci"> If the person subject to the notification obligation is either controlled and/or does control another undertaking then the second option applies.</span></span></p>
<p class="kf"><span class="cd"> </span></p>
<p class="kg"><span><sup><span class="cb">xiv</span></sup></span><span><span class="ci"> The full chain of controlled undertakings starting with the ultimate controlling natural person or legal entity has to be presented also in the cases, in which only on subsidiary level a threshold is crossed or reached and the subsidiary undertaking discloses the notification as only thus the markets get always the full picture of the group holdings. In case of multiple chains through which the voting rights and/or financial instruments are effectively held the chains have to be presented chain by chain leaving a row free between different chains (e.g.: A, B, C, free row, A, B, D, free row, A, E, F etc.).</span></span></p>
<p class="kf"><span class="cd"> </span></p>
<p class="kg"><span><sup><span class="cb">xv</span></sup></span><span><span class="ci"> The names of controlled undertakings through which the voting rights and/or financial instruments are effectively held have to be presented irrespectively whether the controlled undertakings cross or reach the lowest applicable threshold themselves.</span></span></p>
<p class="kf"><span class="cd"> </span></p>
<p class="kg"><span><sup><span class="cb">xvi</span></sup></span><span><span class="ci"> Example: Correction of a previous notification.</span></span></p>
<p class="kh"><span class="bz"> </span></p>
<p class="kh"><span class="bz"> </span></p>
